This is the introductory vignette for the VDPO package. First, we are going to
load the package

```{r setup}
library(VDPO)
```

Now, we are going to fit a model

```{r}
data <- VDPO::VDPO_example_vd
formula <- y ~ ffvd(X_se, nbasis = c(10, 10, 10))
res <- VDPO(formula = formula, data = data)
```

We can use the `summary` function to see a summary of the model

```{r}
summary(res)
```


With the model already fited, we can plot it using the `plot` function:

```{r}
plot(res)
```
